Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT Movie_Id, Actor_Id FROM Acts WHERE Movie_Id = @movieId and Actor_Id = @actorId) BEGIN
insert into Acts(Actor_Id, Movie_Id) VALUES(@actorId, @movieId);
END END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
HeaderContents
Property.Value: create TRIGGER [dbo].[InsertMovieMetascore] ON [dbo].[Review] after insert AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE FUNCTION [dbo].[SearchMovieByTitle] ( @searchText nvarchar(30) ) RETURNS @findedMovies TABLE ( [Id] [int] not null, [Duration] [int] null, [Title] [nvarchar](50) null, [Desctiprion] [nvarchar](100) null, [Director_Id] [int] not null, [Distributor_Id] [int] not null, [MetaScore] [decimal] null, [Deleted] [bit] not null ) AS
